channel.title: Abouts on Kashyap Tumkur's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Kashyap Tumkur's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Kashyap Tumkur, a software engineer, technology geek, and an avid reader based out of Northern California. I set up this blog to journal my experiences and polish my writing skills. If you’re looking for my professional information, see my LinkedIn page.
